body_content.explanation: a man who is married to the political leader of a country or part of a country:
examples: He later became the First Gentleman of Argentina.
People in France are growing increasingly curious about their next potential first lady or first gentleman.

body_content.explanation: a man who is married to the president of the US, to a governor of a state in the US, or to another person with an important position in the government:
examples: They invited the Governor and First Gentleman to the ceremony, but did not expect they would attend.
He said he enjoyed speaking to other first gentlemen; men married to female governors.
52 per cent of voters said that a potential First Lady or First Gentleman would influence their vote.
